title: Social Change in Future Selves:
text:
Research Questions


Are there changes in youth’s views of their future selves as spouses, parents, and workers?

Do these projected future selves vary by gender?

title: Social Change in Future Selves:
text:
How good do you think you would be as a _________


























Monitoring the Future 12th Grade Surveys (1976-2023)

title: Social Change in Future Selves:
text:
How good do you think you would be as a _________











Monitoring the Future 12th Grade Surveys (1976-2023)

title: Social Change in Future Selves:
text:
These next questions ask you to guess how well you might do in several different situations. How good do you think you would be as a:





husband or wife?
parent?
worker on a job?




Response options:

poor
not so good
fairly good
good
very good
